effect.black_white: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
effect.black_2_white_2: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.

short_effect.black_white: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
